name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven AI Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **AI integration**, and **machine learning** including **NLP**. Demonstrated expertise in **microservices** with a strong understanding of **DevOps** principles, utilizing **Docker** and **Jenkins pipelines** for CI/CD automation. Proven ability to design and deploy scalable solutions on **Azure**, **GCP**, and **AWS** cloud platforms, leveraging **cloud-native** architectures to drive impactful results.  Experienced in developing AI-driven applications and integrating **Generative AI** capabilities to enhance data management and analytics.
Skilled in leading MLOps initiatives, focusing on model deployment and management using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Strong background in **distributed architectures** and **Agile methodologies**, with a focus on ensuring compliance with industry standards. Notable strengths include exceptional organizational and time management skills, with a passion for innovation and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions.
